name: The Swamp Haunts
description:
WARNING: THERE IS A GAME BREAKING BUG IN WHERE IF YOU USE THE MENU, THE POSITION OF THE FROGS WILL MOVE AROUND. RETRY INSTEAD THE WHOLE PAGE FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE (POSSIBLE).

The Swamp Haunts you. You play as a frog going into the unknown until you find another mysterious scary frog who seems to be pulling you inward to be bubbled up. Aside from that, legend says ghosts follow you after staying long in The Swamp. Resist the scary and unknown and sometimes don't resist as you take a fast launch BONKING the frog. After a while, maybe it will stop and then The Swamp won't haunt you.

The Swamp Haunts you is a game dedicated to JollyBear/temposparkz for the Secret Santa Jam.

Controls: Up, Down, Left, Right to Move and Space to Play

Credits: Takago: Programmer, Artist, Music Composer, Miyaki: Programmer, Artist
